statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_analytics;
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM marketing_analytics;
SELECT campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_analytics WHERE total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT * FROM marketing_analytics WHERE total_conversions > 50 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_conversions FROM marketing_analytics WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM marketing_analytics ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_conversions ASC, campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM marketing_analytics WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' AND total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT campaign_type, SUM(total_impressions) AS total_impressions_sum, SUM(total_clicks) AS total_clicks_sum FROM marketing_analytics GROUP BY campaign_type;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM marketing_analytics WHERE total_impressions > 50000 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS campaign_duration_days FROM marketing_analytics WHERE total_conversions > 10 ORDER BY campaign_duration_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaign_analytics WHERE total_clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaign_analytics WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM customer_engagement_data WHERE engagement_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaign_analytics WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_clicks FROM marketing_campaign_analytics WHERE total_clicks < 50 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM marketing_campaign_analytics;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaign_analytics WHERE total_impressions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_data WHERE engagement_type = 'purchase' AND engagement_duration > 30;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, total_impressions FROM marketing_campaign_analytics ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_date, product_id FROM customer_engagement_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, engagement_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE total_interactions < 100 ORDER BY last_interaction_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, revenue_generated FROM e_commerce_strategies WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE purchases_count > 10 AND total_interactions < 100 ORDER BY last_interaction_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, revenue_generated FROM e_commerce_strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, engagement_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_type, engagement_duration FROM customer_engagement WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM analytics_data GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 AND is_active = TRUE
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT campaign_name, budget, is_active FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM CustomerEngagement WHERE campaign_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM AnalyticsData WHERE interaction_duration > 60;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM ECommerceStrategies WHERE target_audience = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT engagement_id, customer_id, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM CustomerEngagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Purchase' AND engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT data_id, campaign_id, engagement_id, interaction_time, interaction_duration FROM AnalyticsData ORDER BY engagement_date ASC, interaction_duration DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, description FROM ECommerceStrategies WHERE target_audience = 'Millennials' ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
